docs.abstract: Ford Motor Co plans to move production of its Focus compact car from Wayne, Mich, to plant in Mexico, and to convert Wayne site to truck and SUV factory; move reflects market shifts and will not result in reduction of American jobs, but has nonetheless been criticized by some.

headline.main: Ford Plants Go to Mexico, but U.S. Jobs Stay Around
headline.print_headline: Yes, Ford Is Building in Mexico. No, It’s Not Cutting U.S. Jobs.
